name: Chargebee Trigger
semantic_context: Starts the workflow when Chargebee events occur
natural_language_description: 这是 Chargebee Trigger 节点。主要用于: Starts the workflow when Chargebee events occur

events.name: events
events.natural_language_description: 参数名: Events | 默认值: [] | (必填项)
available_options: * (值: *) - Any time any event is triggered (Wildcard Event)
Card Added (值: card_added) - Triggered when a card is added for a customer
Card Deleted (值: card_deleted) - Triggered when a card is deleted for a customer
Card Expired (值: card_expired) - Triggered when the card for a customer has expired
Card Expiring (值: card_expiring) - Triggered when the customer's credit card is expiring soon.Triggered 30 days before the expiry date
Card Updated (值: card_updated) - Triggered when the card is updated for a customer
Customer Changed (值: customer_changed) - Triggered when a customer is changed
Customer Created (值: customer_created) - Triggered when a customer is created
Customer Deleted (值: customer_deleted) - Triggered when a customer is deleted

Invoice Created (值: invoice_created) - Event triggered (in the case of metered billing) when a 'Pending' invoice is created that has usage related charges or line items to be added, before being closed. This is triggered only when the “Notify for Pending Invoices” option is enabled.
Invoice Deleted (值: invoice_deleted) - Event triggered when an invoice is deleted
Invoice Generated (值: invoice_generated) - Event triggered when a new invoice is generated. In case of metered billing, this event is triggered when a 'Pending' invoice is closed.
Invoice Updated (值: invoice_updated) - Triggered when the invoice’s shipping/billing address is updated, if the invoice is voided, or when the amount due is modified due to payments applied/removed
Payment Failed (值: payment_failed) - Triggered when attempt to charge customer's credit card fails
Payment Initiated (值: payment_initiated) - Triggered when a payment is initiated via direct debit
Payment Refunded (值: payment_refunded) - Triggered when a payment refund is made
Payment Succeeded (值: payment_succeeded) - Triggered when the payment is successfully collected
Refund Initiated (值: refund_initiated) - Triggered when a refund is initiated via direct debit
Subscription Activated (值: subscription_activated) - Triggered after the subscription has been moved from 'Trial' to 'Active' state
Subscription Cancellation Scheduled (值: subscription_cancellation_scheduled) - Triggered when subscription is scheduled to cancel at end of current term

Subscription Cancelled (值: subscription_cancelled) - Triggered when the subscription is cancelled. If it is cancelled due to non payment or because the card details are not present, the subscription will have the possible reason as 'cancel_reason'.
Subscription Cancelling (值: subscription_cancelling) - Triggered 6 days prior to the scheduled cancellation date
Subscription Changed (值: subscription_changed) - Triggered when the subscription's recurring items are changed
Subscription Created (值: subscription_created) - Triggered when a new subscription is created
Subscription Deleted (值: subscription_deleted) - Triggered when a subscription is deleted
Subscription Reactivated (值: subscription_reactivated) - Triggered when the subscription is moved from cancelled state to 'Active' or 'Trial' state
Subscription Renewal Reminder (值: subscription_renewal_reminder) - Triggered 3 days before each subscription's renewal
Subscription Renewed (值: subscription_renewed) - Triggered when the subscription is renewed from the current term
Subscription Scheduled Cancellation Removed (值: subscription_scheduled_cancellation_removed) - Triggered when scheduled cancellation is removed for the subscription
Subscription Shipping Address Updated (值: subscription_shipping_address_updated) - Triggered when shipping address is added or updated for a subscription
Subscription Started (值: subscription_started) - Triggered when a 'future' subscription gets started
Subscription Trial Ending (值: subscription_trial_ending) - Triggered 6 days prior to the trial period's end date
Transaction Created (值: transaction_created) - Triggered when a transaction is recorded
Transaction Deleted (值: transaction_deleted) - Triggered when a transaction is deleted

Transaction Updated (值: transaction_updated) - Triggered when a transaction is updated. E.g. (1) When a transaction is removed, (2) or when an excess payment is applied on an invoice, (3) or when amount_capturable gets updated.
